frontmatter.metaDescription: TechGry A technology learning place for everyone.  Have you ever wondered what to focus upon with the abundant information out there. You cannot spend your limited time  trying to learn everything going nowhere.  TechGry tries to filter through all of it following 80/20 rule.  TechGry tries to explain things in one liners giving you analogies saving you tons of time.
